articles.title: Face masks highly effective against Covid-19, new evidence suggests - The Irish Times
articles.description: Three separate studies find routine wearing of face masks can curb spread of coronavirus
articles.content:
Three new studies from Germany, Britain and the United States have indicated face masks are highly effective in stopping the spread of coronavirus from person to person.
